properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.connection-string
properties.description: The connection string to be used to connect to Azure Blob storage

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.container-name
properties.description: The name of the container where the payloads will be stored

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.endpoint
properties.description: The endpoint to be used to connect to Azure Blob storage

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.sas-token
properties.description: The sas token to be used for authenticating requests

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.signed-url-expiration-duration
properties.description: The time for which the shared access signature is valid

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.task-input-path
properties.description: The path at which the task inputs will be stored

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.task-output-path
properties.description: The path at which the task outputs will be stored

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.workflow-input-path
properties.description: The path at which the workflow inputs will be stored

properties.name: conductor.external-payload-storage.azureblob.workflow-output-path
properties.description: The path at which the workflow outputs will be stored
